attributes.action: Debate Vote of No Confidence in Work & Pensions Secretary, Iain Duncan-Smith MP.
attributes.background: Following the Welfare Reform & Work Bill Debate [20th July 2015]; We the public do not accept Mr. Duncan-Smith's Welfare Reforms.  Including: Reducing the Welfare Cap; Abolishing Child Poverty Targets; Removing Housing Assistance for Younger People; Child Tax Credit Cuts & Disability Benefit Changes

rejection.details: We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104436 You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
